thread.section_title: NASA ‘cuts live feed from international space station after mysterious object filmed speeding past’ – Metro
thread.title: NASA ‘cuts live feed from international space station after mysterious object filmed speeding past’
thread.title_full: NASA ‘cuts live feed from international space station after mysterious object filmed speeding past’

author: Tanveer Mann
title: NASA ‘cuts live feed from international space station after mysterious object filmed speeding past’
text:
Mysterious object spotted on NASA’s live feed (Picture: NASA) A British alien hunter believes he has spotted a UFO during a live feed from the International Space Station. 
NASA spots comet – and mysterious object – heading towards Earth John Craddick, from Wolverhampton, claims the ‘mysterious object’ appeared on NASA’s live feed before the ISS was inexplicably cut for several seconds.
Craddick says he’s never seen anything like it before.
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
He told the Mirror : ‘I’ve been watching it [the live feed] for years but never seen any UFOs on it before.
NASA to launch mission to metal asteroid which is worth £8,000,000,000,000,000,000 ‘I was showing a friend how it worked at around 11.30pm when the feed cut out, and 35 seconds after it came back on, this object appeared.
‘At first it was really small and then it grew bigger, lasting for about 25 seconds.’
The ISS live feed reportedly was cut as the mysterious object appeared (Picture: NASA) Mr Craddick is convinced it must be proof of alien life because ‘nothing human can fly that high’.
Last year, something similar happened when an object was spotted just above the Earth’s atmosphere – the ISS feed was cut.
UK-born Nasa astronaut Piers Sellers dies The incident occurred on July 9 and was first reported by avid UFO hunter Streetcap1 in a video uploaded the same day.
The hunter did not outright imply that the object was an alien spacecraft but hinted that the camera being turned off was slightly sinister.
He said: ‘What made it interesting was that the camera cut off when the UFO seemed to stop.’
